sections.paragraph: (pasture), one of the cities of Zebulun, given with its "suburbs" to the Merarite Levites. (Joshua 21:35) It is the same which in (Joshua 19:15) is inaccurately given in the Authorized Version as Nahallal, the Hebrew being in both cases identical. Elsewhere it is called [899]Nahalol. (Judges 1:30) It is identified with the modern Malul, a village in the plain of Esdraelon.
